scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && gnome-extensions pack --extra-source "$PROJECT_CWD/LICENSE" $(ls "$PROJECT_CWD/src/"*".js" | sed 's/^/--extra-source /') -o dist/ --force src/
scripts.gnome-install: yarn run build && gnome-extensions install "$@" dist/reorder-workspaces@jer.dev.shell-extension.zip && { gnome-extensions enable reorder-workspaces@jer.dev; { killall -3 -e gnome-shell || true; }; }
